channel.title: OMG? added banks but you cannot bank =$
channel.description:
Ok this is werid i have just added new banks and when i click on them nothing happens. Same I added ghost bankers but i can stand next to and clicked on him and still nothing happened I went to varrock and the banks work they i dont understand its werid
please could you help me out? its dodian source (Vipscape)

item.title: OMG? added banks but you cannot bank =$
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok umm change it back to this if ((objectID == 2213) || (objectID == 2214) || (objectID == 3045) || (objectID == 5276) || (objectID == 6084 || objectID == 11758)) {
skillX = objectX;
skillY = objectY;
WanneBank = 1;

then look for
WanneBank = 1; in your client.java and tell me what you find

item.source: OMG? added banks but you cannot bank =$

item.title: OMG? added banks but you cannot bank =$
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok ill help you but i really shouldent look for case 132: and add this under it

if (objectID == 2213 || objectID == 11758) { //Bank Booth skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; NpcWanneTalk = ####; }
The npcwannetalk is when the guy asks you if you want to open your bank or cheack your pin
Now the 2213 is for the regular bank booths and the 11758 if the bank booths in fally the newer ones
and to help the guy with the gate add this in the same place

if (objectID == ####) { //Place the new gate ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), objectY, (objectID + 1), face, 0); ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), (objectY + 1), (objectID + 4), face2, 0); //Remove the original gate ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY + 1), -1, -1, 0); ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, -1, -1, 0);
and where the #### is you put the ID of the gate.
now to make it so you right click the bank booth and go right to your bank look for:

			case 252:

That is object click 2 and if you scroll down farther there is object click 3
add this under object click 2

if ((objectID == 2213) || (objectID == 2214) || (objectID == 3045) || (objectID == 5276) || (objectID == 6084 || objectID == 11758)) { skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; WanneBank = 1;
And then save and compile
